title: Why am i getting punished ?
body: A few games ago i went jungle riven in a normal game and there was this ezreal that locked in jungle and lied about how he got it first i knew he was lying because i joined before him. When we got in game he started flaming everyone and insulting me. The enemy xin backed me up saying how he did the same thing last champ select. ez threatened me to get banned i doubt i would have gotten punished because the enemy team disagreed with his saying and actions. But after my next game of playing league i got chat restricted. why am i getting punished and the real troll getting away with all of this?

replies.body: it tells you when some one was punished as a result of your report
because you were swearing over and over and over because of him
and where did you get your sources?

You wouldn't have gotten a ban without having said abusive things.

Just because someone else is being a %%%%, don't give you the right to do the same.

i will admit that i said thing that isn't right but there is still injustice he should be getting the same treatment as i would be having and i will say he was being way more toxic than anyone in the whole game

How do you know he didn't get a chat restriction? You say this assuming that the other guy was not also punished, where really if he did something to warrant a punishment, he will receive a punishment.
